data.title: Ebay Statistics - Ebay Facts, Stats, Trends & Data (2024)
data.text:
NASDAQ: EBAY

Ebay Inc Statistics & Facts

*Your capital is at risk. Other fees apply.

Ebay User, Usage & Platform Statistics

Ebay Active Buyers

Does anybody still use eBay?

eBay has 134 million active buyers. [ 1 ]

Last Accessed: Mar 23, 2023

Ebay Sellers

How many sellers are on eBay?

eBay had 17 million sellers at the end of 2021, down from 19 million in 2020. [ 2 ]

Date: Feb 24, 2022

Ebay Sellers by Country

Which country uses eBay most?

United States

31%

United Kingdom

29%

Germany

15%

China

12%

Australia

4%

Italy

2%

31% of eBay sellers are based in the United States. [ 3 ]

Date: Jun 18, 2020

15% of eBay sellers in the U.S. are based in California. [ 4 ]

Date: Jun 18, 2020

Ebay Market Share

Ebay vs Competition: Reach (U.S.)

Comparing eBay's shopping app to its competitors in the U.S. by reach.

eBay (main)

33.28%

Amazon (main)

80.64%

Walmart (main)

46.08%

Target (main)

24.31%

Groupon (main)

18.75%

Etsy

17.21%

eBay's shopping app has a 33.28% reach in the U.S. [ 8 ]

Date: Sep 25, 2020

Ebay vs Competitors: Preference for Cross-Border Purchases

Which digital retailers do shoppers prefer for cross-border purchases?

eBay

14%

Amazon

25%

Alibaba/AliExpress

20%

Wish

11%

14% of digital buyers prefer eBay for cross-border purchases, compared to 25% that prefer Amazon. [ 9 ]

Date: Feb 14, 2020

Ebay Miscellaneous Statistics

eBay raised $123 million for non-profit organizations in 2020. [ 25 ]
